verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump 's administration] [ARGM-TMP: last night] [V: imposed] [ARG1: new trade tariffs on steel and aluminium imports into the US on the EU , Canada and Mexico] . Yet China is really at the heart of his anger at an ' unfair ' market .

Trump 's administration last night imposed new trade tariffs on steel and aluminium imports into the US on the EU , Canada and Mexico . Yet [ARG1: China] [V: is] [ARGM-ADV: really] [ARG2: at the heart of his anger at an ' unfair ' market] .
